about_page.hero_lead: Arslan Tech is a specialized IT solutions company helping businesses build secure, flexible infrastructure that supports their growth.
about_page.intro_title: A tech partner close to your reality
about_page.intro_lead: We work with SMEs and organizations that need a technical partner who understands their daily challenges and delivers practical solutions, not just products.
about_page.intro_badge_text: Hundreds of completed projects in CCTV, networking, call center systems, and low-voltage solutions.
about_page.vision_p1: To be the preferred technology partner for companies seeking secure and flexible solutions that grow with them long-term.
about_page.vision_p2: We focus on building stable infrastructure that reduces downtime and boosts your team's productivity.
about_page.mission_p: Turning technology from a burden into a helpful tool for management, sales, and customer service.
about_page.mission_item1: Designing solutions that match the size and nature of each business.
about_page.mission_item2: Providing ongoing technical support, not just a one-time installation.
about_page.mission_item3: Simplifying systems as much as possible for everyday use.
about_page.why_item1_text: We help you choose the right solution before buying or installing, so you avoid unnecessary costs.
about_page.why_item2_text: We focus on implementation quality and documentation so your systems are easy to extend and maintain.
about_page.why_item3_text: A support team ready for questions and incidents, with maintenance contracts that match your business size.
about_page.stat_years_text: Operational experience across many implementation, commissioning and support projects.
about_page.stat_projects_text: Projects in sectors like restaurants, offices, retail stores and factories.
about_page.stat_clients_text: Businesses that rely on us to run and monitor their technical systems.
about_page.cta_text: Book a quick call with the Arslan Tech team to review your current setup and propose practical, budget-friendly solutions.

webdesign.hero_title: We Turn Your Vision Into Stunning Digital Reality
webdesign.hero_lead: From initial idea to launch, we'll implement a solution that fits your business with affordable prices and packages that match your budget, with superior performance and world-class user experience.
webdesign.hero_card_text: Our websites are not just web pages, but effective business tools that help your business grow and increase sales. We guarantee you a professional design experience with superior performance and continuous technical support.
webdesign.services_lead: We provide comprehensive web design and development solutions that combine beauty with high functionality
webdesign.service_speed_desc: We use the latest technologies to ensure your website loads in fractions of a second
webdesign.service_security_desc: Complete protection for your data and customers with best cybersecurity practices
webdesign.service_ux_desc: Modern designs that intelligently adapt to all screens and devices
webdesign.packages_lead: Choose the right package for your project with competitive prices and guaranteed quality
webdesign.package_starter_desc: Perfect for small businesses and startups
webdesign.package_business_desc: The optimal solution for medium and large companies
webdesign.package_ecommerce_desc: Complete solution for selling your products online
webdesign.showcase_lead: Discover our successful projects and how we helped our clients achieve their digital goals
webdesign.showcase_project_title: AZ International - Engineering Inspection Certificate Management System
webdesign.showcase_project_desc: An integrated digital system for issuing, tracking and monitoring engineering inspection certificates with utmost precision and complete cloud security.
webdesign.showcase_feature_1: Comprehensive management of engineering inspection services
webdesign.showcase_feature_2: Smart import of certificate data from Excel
webdesign.faq_lead: Answers to the most common questions about web design and development services
webdesign.faq_q1: How long does it take to implement the website?
webdesign.faq_a1: Usually 10 to 20 days depending on the content size and required features. We work with you step by step to ensure delivery on time.
webdesign.faq_q2: Do I provide content and images?
webdesign.faq_a2: We provide templates and sample texts, and we can help choose appropriate images. You can also provide your own content if available.
webdesign.faq_a3: Yes, we support Arabic and English with a simple translation structure and design that adapts to text direction.
webdesign.faq_q4: Do I provide hosting and domain?
webdesign.faq_a4: We can manage hosting and domain for you or work with your current provider. We offer performance-optimized hosting solutions.
webdesign.faq_q5: Do you provide technical support after delivery?
webdesign.faq_a5: Yes, we provide free technical support for one month after delivery, and flexible maintenance contracts for long-term support.
webdesign.faq_q6: Can I edit the website myself?
webdesign.faq_a6: Yes, we provide an easy-to-use control panel that allows you to edit content and images easily without technical expertise.
webdesign.cta_lead: Our team is ready to turn your vision into stunning digital reality in just a few days
webdesign.showcase_project2_title: Zayat Mokifat - Air Conditioning & Refrigeration Company Website

webdesign.showcase2_feature_1: Comprehensive display of air conditioning and refrigeration services
webdesign.showcase2_feature_2: Responsive design that works on all devices
webdesign.showcase2_feature_6: Ultra-fast loading speed and excellent performance
webdesign.showcase_project3_title: Fast React Pizza - Pizza Ordering Web App
webdesign.showcase_project3_desc: Modern and interactive web application for pizza ordering built with React technology, providing a smooth and fast user experience with a contemporary interface and superior performance.
systems.hero_card_text: Our systems are not just software, but smart solutions that help organize your business and increase productivity. We guarantee you an easy user experience with superior performance and continuous technical support.
systems.services_lead: We provide comprehensive management system solutions that combine ease of use with technical power
systems.service_pos_desc: Advanced POS solutions that support all types of businesses with easy and fast interfaces
systems.service_inventory_desc: Comprehensive inventory management system with accurate tracking and smart alerts
systems.service_analytics_desc: Smart dashboards and detailed reports for informed decision making
systems.packages_title: Packages That Suit Your Business Size
systems.packages_lead: Choose the right package for your business with competitive prices and guaranteed quality
systems.package_basic_desc: Perfect for small businesses and startups
systems.package_business_desc: The optimal solution for medium and large companies
systems.package_enterprise_desc: Comprehensive solution for large institutions and commercial chains
systems.showcase_lead: Discover our advanced software solutions and how we helped our clients improve their business efficiency
systems.faq_lead: Answers to the most common questions about our management systems and POS solutions
systems.faq_q1: How long does it take to implement the system?
systems.faq_a1: Usually 5 to 15 days depending on the system size and required features. We work with you step by step to ensure delivery on time.
systems.faq_q2: Does the system work on the cloud or locally?
systems.faq_a2: We provide both options. The system can run locally on your servers or on the cloud according to your needs and preferences.
systems.faq_q3: Can multiple branches be connected to the same system?
systems.faq_a3: Yes, our systems support multiple branches with centralized monitoring and data exchange between branches.
systems.faq_q4: Do you provide training on using the system?
systems.faq_a4: Yes, we provide comprehensive training for your team on using the system with a detailed user manual and continuous technical support.
systems.faq_q5: Can the system be customized according to my needs?
systems.faq_a5: Of course, we customize systems to suit your business nature and special requirements with the ability to add new features.
systems.faq_q6: What types of reports are available?
systems.faq_a6: We provide comprehensive reports for sales, inventory, profits, employee performance, and detailed analytics to help you make decisions.
systems.cta_lead: Our team is ready to transform your operations into an advanced digital system in just a few days
